reviews.customers_say: Customers find this Christmas sweater cute and well-made, with one mentioning it looks good after washing on gentle settings. The sweater is comfortable, with one customer noting it's not itchy at all, and they appreciate its true-to-size fit and nice fabric feel. The thickness receives mixed feedback, with some customers finding it thick while others say it's too thick.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Quality
items.body: I always hesitate buying clothes online but am so glad I did. This sweater fits perfectly and the material is quality. I’m headed to several holiday parties and feel like a confident elf with my head held high. Love it! Read more
items.author: Nancy Pance

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality item!
items.body: Super cute and quality fabric. A real sweater, not thin like some I have bought. You will be pleased! True to size also. Read more
items.author: Janice

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: This ugly Christmas sweater is actually too fun and cute ! Fits to size, very well made, warm and comfortable . Slight smell when opened but washed before wearing. No more smell. Washes well on handwashing cycle, hang up to dry Washed inside out. Got lots of compliments. It’s very thick and comfy- almost too warm for Texas winter but for the little time I will wear it- great investment. Next year I can add bells, or tiny gingerbread men if I want to change it up. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: VLowe

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater but problem with arms
items.body: Very pretty sweater. It is very soft but I certainly would not call it chunky. It would have scored 5 stars but, for me, there is a problem with the arms. It may just be me and how I want something to fit. They are long enough to come to the tips of my fingers. Plus I found them to not be tapered enough which left the ribbed cuffs too big. I'm going to use my serger to taper them to suit my taste. Read more
items.author: Coeta S. Shanks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute
items.body: Super cute! Nice quality and an original but fun pattern. I received lots of compliments. Read more
items.author: DavenportM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and comfortable sweater
items.body: Oh my gosh, I was happy to find this sweater and laughed so hard. So many times these themed Christmas tops look cheap, but this actually looked like a nice sweater. It was a great weight for a midwest winter. Sizing is accurate. Read more
items.author: Erin Kohl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vintage and new blend of awesomeness
items.body: I’ve got a ton of compliments every time I wear the sweater. I love the vintage vibe. Read more
items.author: T

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: Cute sweater, soft fabric, fits good. However it got very frilly after just wearing it one time. Read more
items.author: Stephanie Erickson

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Women Beige&red (Snowflake), Women Blue (Let It Snow), Women Posypink, Women Smalltree, Women Green (Elf), Women Pink&green, Women Blue (Stocking), Women Santadressblack, Women Pink (Gingerbread Man), Women White (Falala), Women Carandtree, Women Red (Retro Tree), Women Retro Red, Women Beige (Falala). If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
